title: Reverse String
description:
## Reverse String

Write a function that reverses a string. The input string is given as an array of characters.

You must do this by modifying the input array in-place with O(1) extra memory.

### Example 1:
```
Input: ["h","e","l","l","o"]
Output: ["o","l","l","e","h"]
```

### Example 2:
```
Input: ["H","a","n","n","a","h"]
Output: ["h","a","n","n","a","H"]
```
